settings.hamburger_button_styles: bg-white p-2 inline-flex items-center justify-center focus:outline-none
settings.navbar_dropdown_classes: absolute z-10 -ml-5 mt-5 transform px-2 w-screen max-w-md sm:px-0 lg:ml-0 lg:left-1/2 lg:-translate-x-1/2
settings.dropdown_content_classes: shadow-lg border ring-black ring-opacity-5 overflow-hidden rounded-lg
settings.dropdown_inner_classes: relative grid gap-6 bg-white px-5 py-6 sm:gap-8 sm:p-8
settings.dropdown_link_classes: -m-3 p-3 flex items start rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-100
settings.utility_menu_classes: hidden md:flex items-center justify-end md:flex-1 space-x-5
settings.mobile_menu_classes: absolute z-10 top-0 inset-x-0 p-2 transform origin-top-left md:hidden
settings.mobile_menu_content_classes: shadow-lg rounded-lg ring-1 ring-black ring-opacity-5 bg-white w-full
settings.mobile_menu_dropdown_button_classes: text-base text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-900 flex items-center justify-between w-full
settings.mobile_menu_dropdown_inner_classes: -m-3 p-3 mt-2 flex items-center rounded-md text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-50
